#summary M3 structs.

= Introduction =

These are the structures found so far in the .m3 files.


= Details =

{{{
// Size = 8 byte
// Complete
struct Reference 
{
    /*0x00*/ uint32 nEntries;
    /*0x04*/ uint32 ref;
};

// Size = 16 byte
// Incomplete
struct ReferenceEntry 
{ 
    /*0x00*/ char id[4]; 
    /*0x04*/ uint32 offset; 
    /*0x08*/ uint32 nEntries; 
    /*0x0C*/ uint32 d1; // Seems to be related to size of block / number of fields.
}; 
// Size = 20 byte
// Complete
struct FileHeader
{ 
    /*0x00*/ char id[4]; 
    /*0x04*/ uint32 ofsRefs; 
    /*0x08*/ uint32 nRefs; 
    /*0x0C*/ Reference MODL; 
};

// Size = 156 byte
// Incomplete
struct BONE
{
    /*0x00*/ int32 d1; // Keybone?
    /*0x04*/ Reference name;
    /*0x0C*/ uint32 flags;
    /*0x10*/ int16 parent;
};
}}}
